name: Aleksandr Cherednichenko
previewText: I am a front-end developer with 2 years of commercial experience, last of which I have been using Vue 3, a state-of-the-art framework for building web user interfaces. I have a showcase of amazing web applications that I have built. I am proficient in HTML, SCSS, JavaScript and other web technologies. I also have a flair for design and base proficiency with graphic design applications (e.g., Figma). I was born in Magnitogorsk, but I moved to Saint Petersburg to pursue my passion in this field. Currently, I am living in Thailand and looking for remote work.
usefulTitle: I can be a valuable asset for potential employers because:

useful.1: A proven track record of delivering high-quality web applications with Vue 3
useful.3: A keen interest in learning new technologies and best practices
useful.4: I have a flexible and adaptive mindset

work1.name: AT-Work
work1.description: Компания которая занимаеться разработкой сервиса, который включает в себя поиск и найм специалистов, размещение объявлений о продаже товаров, а также подбор исполнителей услуг

work2.name: Reelmotion Games
work2.description: Компания специализирующаяся на разработке уникальных гемблинг проектов для онлайна, а так же на социальные проекты и i-gaming индустрию

education1.name: MAGNITOGORSK INDUSTRIAL COLLEGE
education1.description: Компания специализирующаяся на разработке уникальных гемблинг проектов для онлайна, а так же на социальные проекты и i-gaming индустрию

education2.name: NOSOV MAGNITOGORSK STATE TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY
education2.description: Компания специализирующаяся на разработке уникальных гемблинг проектов для онлайна, а так же на социальные проекты и i-gaming индустрию

project1.name: My personal website
project1.description: My website is a portfolio. The project is written in Vue 3 Composition API, in conjunction with the Vite builder. Used: EsLint, i18n. I developed the design based on examples of methods found on the Internet.

project2.name: Integration OpenAI API
project2.description: Integration of the public OpenAI API in a Vue project. This project was conceived for a more accessible understanding and use of AI. Some components and functions, as well as texts used in the project, were generated by AI. The project is currently on hold.

project3.name: Create a letter of recommendation
project3.description: In this project, the functionality of creating a recommendation letter is implemented. The project was written in vanilla JS. During the data entry process, the already filled data is saved.

project4.name: Create a new resume
project4.description: A project to create a new resume for a portal similar to HH. Written using the Sass preprocessor, the main functionality is written in vanilla JS.

project5.name: Ad display page
project5.description: A page for displaying job vacancies on the site, for finding potential employees. The functionality to remember selected search filters has been implemented. Further integration was carried out with the Bitrix CMS.3
